org.jhove2.app.util
Class FeatureConfigurationUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.app.util.FeatureConfigurationUtil

public class FeatureConfigurationUtil
extends Object

Base class for utility applications to generate .properties files for JHOVE2 Reportable classes.

Author:
smorrissey

Method Detail

getReportableFromClassName

public static Reportable getReportableFromClassName(String className)
                                             throws JHOVE2Exception
Creates Reportable object corresponding to class name passed as parameter

Parameters:
className - name of class for which to create a Reportable instance
Returns:
Reportable
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception - if class name represents a class which does not extend Reportable, or for any other exception thrown, or if Reportable does not have 0-argument constructor

getPropertiesAsList

public static List<String> getPropertiesAsList(Reportable reportable)
Return list of all property I8R value strings for a Reportable object

Parameters:
reportable - Reportable object
Returns:
List containing all property I8R value strings

getPropertiesAsReportablePropertyInfoList

public static List<ReportablePropertyInfo> getPropertiesAsReportablePropertyInfoList(Reportable reportable)
Return list of all ReportablePropertyInfo for all reportable properties of a Reportable object

Parameters:
reportable - Reportable object
Returns:
List containing all property ReportablePropertyInfo for Reportable

getProperitiesAsReportablePropertyInfoSet

public static Set<ReportablePropertyInfo> getProperitiesAsReportablePropertyInfoSet(String className)
                                                                             throws JHOVE2Exception
Get set of all ReportablePropertyInfo for a class if it is a Reportable class. This legacy method assumes you want to retrieve ReportableProperties inherited from interfaces and super-classes

Parameters:
className - Name of class for which we want properties
Returns:
set of all ReportablePropertyInfo for that class
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception - if class does not implement Reportable

getProperitiesAsReportablePropertyInfoSet

public static Set<ReportablePropertyInfo> getProperitiesAsReportablePropertyInfoSet(String className,
                                                                                    boolean includeAncestors)
                                                                             throws JHOVE2Exception
Get set of all ReportablePropertyInfo for a class if it is a Reportable class

Parameters:
className - Name of class for which we want properties
includeAncestors - Specifies whether to include properties inherited from interfaces and super-classes
Returns:
set of all ReportablePropertyInfo for that class
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception - if class does not implement Reportable

checkInterfaces

public static void checkInterfaces(Class<?>[] ifs,
                                   Map<String,String> idMap,
                                   ReportablePropertyComparator comparator,
                                   Set<ReportablePropertyInfo> rpiSet)
Introspect on interfaces (and superinterfaces) to retrieve reportable properties.

Parameters:
ifs - Interfaces to examine
idMap - Map of properties identifiers already retrieved
comparator - Reportable property comparator

Returns:

Returns:

Determine if class is an inner, but still reportable, class

Returns:
if class implements Reportable, else false

getReportableFromInnerClassName

public static Class<? extends Reportable> getReportableFromInnerClassName(String className)
Create Class object for className if className is name of public Reportable inner class

Parameters:
className -
Returns:
Class object for className, or null if className is not name of public Reportable inner class

getFilePathFromClasspath

public static String getFilePathFromClasspath(String fileName,
                                              String fileDescription)
                                       throws JHOVE2Exception
Utility method to construct full path to a file on class path. Used for example to locate DROID signature and configuration files. Assumes directory containing these files is on the classpath

Parameters:
fileName - File to be found on class path
fileDescription - descriptor of file to be used in any exception messages
Returns:
String containing path to file
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception - if file is not found or ClassLoader throws exception
